name: VaTK - Visual Analytics Toolkit
short_description: VaTK (Vay-Tik) is a collection of cross platform C++ libraries designed to facilitate the rapid production of visual analysis applications. VaTK is not a game engine, rather a collection of programming resources needed by game engines to do their job.
